component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
value false java.lang.Object true
var true java.lang.String true
sortBy false java.lang.Object Property to be used for sorting.
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the column.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the column.
sortFunction false javax.el.MethodExpression java.lang.Integer sort(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object) Custom pluggable sortFunction.
filterBy false java.lang.Object Property to be used for filtering.
filterStyle false java.lang.String Inline style of the filter element.
filterStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the filter element.
filterOptions false java.lang.Object A collection of selectitems for filter dropdown.
filterMatchMode false java.lang.String startsWith Match mode for filtering.
filterPosition false java.lang.String bottom Location of the column filter with respect to header content. Options are 'bottom'(default) and 'top'.
filterValue false java.lang.Object Value of the filter field.
rowspan false java.lang.Integer 1 Defines the number of rows the column spans.
colspan false java.lang.Integer 1 Defines the number of columns the column spans.
headerText false java.lang.String Shortcut for header facet.
footerText false java.lang.String Shortcut for footer facet.
filterMaxLength false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE Maximum number of characters for an input filter.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies resizable feature at column level. Datatable's resizableColumns must be enabled to use this option.
exportable false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if the column should be exported by dataexporter.
columnIndexVar false java.lang.String true Name of iterator to refer each row index.
width false java.lang.String Width of the column in pixels or percentage.
toggleable false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if panel is toggleable by columnToggler component. Default value is true and a false value marks the column as static.
filterFunction false javax.el.MethodExpression java.lang.Boolean filter(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object, java.util.Locale locale) Custom implementation to filter a value against a constraint.
field false java.lang.String Name of the field to pass lazy load method for filtering and sorting. If not specified, filterBy-sortBy values are used to identify the field name.
priority false java.lang.Integer 0 Priority of the column defined as an integer, lower values have more priority.
sortable false java.lang.Boolean true Boolean value to mark column as sortable.
filterable false java.lang.Boolean true Boolean value to mark column as filterable.
visible false java.lang.Boolean true Controls the visibilty of the column, default is true.
selectRow false java.lang.Boolean true Whether clicking the column selects the row when datatable has row selection enabled, default is true.
ariaHeaderText false java.lang.String Label to read by screen readers, when not specified headerText is used.
